name: StockMagicwithMonteCarlo
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: stock magic mirror
des:
Skill runs a Monte Carlo simulation to predict next-day ranges for a stock ticker, say Ticker is <> or Stock is <>, e.g Stock is FB.
Phrases to use
1) Ticker is <>: generates a prediction for a chosen stock ticker, e.g: Stock is AMZN will return predictions for AMZN for next day
2) Stock is <> : generates a prediction for a chosen stock ticker, e.g: Stock is AMZN will return predictions for AMZN for next day
3) Hello : generates a prediction for a randomly chosen stock ticker
